CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(Event_Manager__c) == "Shawn McDonald"),"Shawn.McDonald@sigsauer.com", IF((TEXT(Event_Manager__c) == "Aisling Meehan"),"Aisling.Meehan@sigsauer.com", IF((TEXT(Event_Manager__c) == "Caitlin Ferdyn"),"Caitlin.Ferdyn@sigsauer.com", IF((TEXT(Event_Manager__c) == "Nicole Brown"),"Nicole.Brown@sigsauer.com", IF((TEXT(Event_Manager__c) == "Lisa Mahan"),"Lisa.Mahan@sigsauer.com", IF((TEXT(Event_Manager__c) == "Michael Clearey"),"Michael.Cleary@sigsauer.com", ""))))))
CustomField.label: Event Manager Email
